abilities.name: Beat the Crowd
abilities.description: The next attack deals additional magical damage against the primary target.
notes: The ability triggers upon reaching the attack point, not upon landing an attack
This means the ability can trigger on missed attacks
For ranged heroes, this is upon projectile launch
However, the attack must land on the target in order to apply the splash damage
Does not trigger when attacking allied units or buildings
Triggers upon attacking ward-type units, but does not apply the attack damage bonus or splash damage
The bonus damage is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus and is magical damage
It is not considered by lifesteal, crit or cleave
It can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. magical damage barrier)
Since it is considered bonus attack damage, it is not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions
The splash damage is applied as spell damage, with the damage type based on the attack damage source
The physical portion is splashed as physical damage, the magical portion is splashed as magical damage
It is fully affected by incoming and outgoing spell damage manipulation and works with spell lifesteal
The splash damage is not affected by Damage Block
The splash damage does not affect the primary target, buildings, or ward-type units

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the magical attack damage bonus is increased by 30%
The attack also splashes to units nearby for a percentage of the attack's damage, including the magical damage
